summary: This script uses Podman to run a read-only container with the BusyBox image, limiting CPU usage and memory allocation for visual and communication tasks.

details.comment: This script uses Podman to run a read-only container with the BusyBox image, limiting CPU usage and memory allocation for visual and communication tasks.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
# use podman? but we have not had the image!
podman run --rm --read-only -ti --cpus 0.01 --memory 2m localhost/busybox
# t -> visual
# i -> communication
